metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17544 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libaspell.a in GNU Aspell before 0.60.8 has a stack-based buffer over-read in acommon::unescape in common/getdata.cpp via an isolated \ character.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17544` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspell - 0.60.7~20110707-4ubuntu0.1
libaspell15 - 0.60.7~20110707-4ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: aspell package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.60.7~20110707-4ubuntu0.1').
